trans-unit.source: Generates classes for Web services that use the SOAP protocol.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class generates client proxy code or abstract server code according to the SOAP protocol.
The class generates a class for each supported binding defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

Typically, instead of invoking <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> directly, a developer uses the class indirectly through the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter"></xref> class.
Initializes the generation of a binding class.

During generation of a class for a given binding, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.BeginClass%2A> method executes before the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class generates methods that correspond to operations.
A binding class.
Performs initialization for an entire code namespace during code generation.

During code generation, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.BeginNamespace%2A> method executes before the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class generates classes that represent bindings.
Processes a binding class after the generation of methods.

During generation of a class for a given binding, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.EndClass%2A> method executes after the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class generates methods that correspond to operations.
Performs processing for an entire code namespace after binding class generation.

During code generation, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.EndNamespace%2A> method executes after the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class generates classes that represent bindings.
Generates method code for a binding class.

During generation of a class for a given binding, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.GenerateMethod%2A> method executes for each binding class method that represents an operation.
The method code for a binding class.
Determines whether a class can be generated for the current binding.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.IsBindingSupported%2A> method determines whether to generate a class for the current binding, as represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.Binding%2A> property.

The method checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.Binding%2A> property's <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding.Extensions%2A> property contains a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding> instance.
In addition, the transport mechanism obtained through the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding.Transport%2A> property must be supported by the current Web services configuration.
`true` if the class can be generated for the current binding; otherwise `false`.
Determines whether the current operation's operation flow is supported.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.IsOperationFlowSupported%2A> method determines whether to generate a method for the current operation, as represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> property.
This evaluation takes place for each operation in a binding for which a class is being generated.
If a `false` value is returned, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.UnsupportedOperationWarning%2A> method executes.
A `true` value is returned only if the input value is <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow.OneWay> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow.RequestResponse>.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection.Flow%2A> property.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.Messages%2A> property is of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection>.
An <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow"></xref> enumeration value that represents a transmission pattern.
`true` if the current operation's operation flow is supported; otherwise `false`.
Checks for the presence of "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" in a string that represents a list of Uniform Resource Indicators (URIs).
A space-delimited list of URIs.
`true` it the string contains [http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/](http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/); otherwise `false`.
Gets a value of "Soap".
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> object that contains the string "Soap".

Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding"></xref> instance obtained through the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.SoapBinding"></xref> property's <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding.Extensions"></xref> property.

A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding"></xref> instance obtained through the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter.SoapBinding"></xref> property's <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding.Extensions"></xref> property.

Gets the object of type <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref> used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter"></xref> class to generate code from mappings between SOAP-encoded XML schema content and .NET Framework types.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class uses a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter> object to create code from .NET Framework type mappings for XML schema elements and data types that enable SOAP encoding, as opposed to literal XML Schema usage.
SOAP encoding is specified in section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
SOAP encoding uses the namespace "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/".

An object of type <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref> used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter"></xref> class to generate code from mappings between SOAP-encoded XML schema content and .NET Framework types.

Gets the object of type <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaImporter"></xref> used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter"></xref> class to generate mappings between SOAP-encoded XML schema content and .NET Framework types.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class uses a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaImporter> object to create .NET Framework type mappings for XML schema elements and data types that enable SOAP encoding, as opposed to literal XML Schema usage.
SOAP encoding is specified in section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
SOAP encoding uses the namespace "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/".

An object of type <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaImporter"></xref> used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter"></xref> class to generate mappings between SOAP-encoded XML schema content and .NET Framework types.

Gets the object of type <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter"></xref> used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter"></xref> class to generate code from mappings between literal XML schema content and .NET Framework types.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class uses an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> object to create .NET Framework type mappings for XML schema elements and data types that require literal XML Schema usage, as opposed to SOAP encoding.
SOAP encoding is specified in section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

An object of type <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter"></xref> used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter"></xref> class to generate code from mappings between literal XML schema content and .NET Framework types.

Gets the object of type <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter"></xref> used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter"></xref> class to generate mappings between literal XML schema content and .NET Framework types.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter> class uses an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> object to create code from .NET Framework type mappings for XML schema elements and data types that require literal XML Schema usage, as opposed to SOAP encoding.
SOAP encoding is specified in section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

An object of type <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter"></xref> used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter"></xref> class to generate mappings between literal XML schema content and .NET Framework types.
